name: hugo-blog-with-react-apps
description: Hugo blog with integrated React applications

scripts.build:apps: for dir in apps/*/; do if [ -f "$dir/package.json" ]; then echo "Building $(basename "$dir")"; cd "$dir" && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..; fi; done
scripts.copy:apps: mkdir -p static/apps && for dir in apps/*/; do if [ -d "$dir/dist" ]; then app_name=$(basename "$dir"); echo "Copying $app_name"; mkdir -p "static/apps/$app_name" && cp -r "$dir/dist/"* "static/apps/$app_name/" 2>/dev/null || cp -r "$dir/dist/." "static/apps/$app_name/"; fi; done
scripts.local: npm run build:apps && npm run copy:apps && hugo server -D
scripts.clean:apps: rm -rf static/apps && find apps -name 'dist' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:apps && rm -rf public/ resources/ .hugo_build.lock
scripts.test:build: npm run build:apps && npm run copy:apps && hugo --minify --gc

author: Shahar Glazner
